column5: My place rocks! Montrose is the best part of town -- I'm near the museums and best bars and restaurants! Lots within walking distance! This is where you want to be!  You have a private bedroom, semi-shared bath in my 3 bed room, 3 story, 2,100 sq.ft. home. Your bed has a memory foam mattress & top notch bedding! Great! I live here alone. You're welcome to share all the common areas, like the dining room and kitchen. I have an awesome cat (who gets awesome reviews), so you must like cats!
column8: Townhome in the Heart of Montrose! (a)
